GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an array of a specified article

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments for a specified article. Can be limited and offset with pagination queries

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an object of a new comment based on request body, for a specified article

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object of an updated article with updated vote value, based on integer value in request body object, for a specified article. vote should be incremented on vote currently on article

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes a comment for a specified article, returns a status and no content message, does not return the deleted comment

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/articles?topic.description: serves an array of all articles for a given topic

articles.title: Another article about Mitch

articles.body: There will never be enough articles about Mitch!

GET /api/articles?sort_by.description: serves an array of all articles sorted by a given article column

GET /api/articles?order.description: serves an array of all articles in ascending or descending order, articles order is defaulted to descending

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves an object of a specific user for a given username

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: serves an object of an updated comment with updated vote value, based on integer value in request body object, for a specified comment. vote should be incremented on vote value currently on comment
